Articles.Content:
You receive a SSTV signal

What do you do?
Inventory.
Sun glasses, 1/2 parachutes, candies...
Use candies on SSTV signal.

The candies transform into sentien life form!

What do you do?
Put on sunglasses.

YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!

You just earned a archivement!

But the living candies start to muliplies!
Eat candies.

Erm ... they does not look yummy ...

Yo notice a rover going towards you like an agressive chicken dancing. It has a long range sattelite dish on it.

What do you do?
Sit in the dish and drive around
You escape the candies but run into Dem Kraken. Buzzing him may lead to unexpected floating precision errors.
buzz the kraken

The kraken is running after your rover!

What do you do!
I tame the kraken
The Kraken cannot be tamed. The Kraken is still advancing towards your rover, and your attempt to tame it has only made it angry.
I get a bunch of orks convince them that they will kill the kracken by touching it and send them off (40k orks)
We drive the rover as fast as we can!
but the wheels pop
Repair wheels. Prepare dimensional warp-drive shift to escape the Kraken.
but jeb forgot the gas
Transmute Char:Jeb into Resource:Fuel.
Enter WAITNONOSTOP Kerbal Unreconstituitionator to provide fuel for the engines.

but the kracken has already caought up to you...(wait am I even doing this right?)

DAMN NINJAS...

(No, no you are not playing this right. This is not "thwart everyone at everything." Go play a text adventure and see what we mean.)

Quickload to launchpad.
Enraged, the Kraken suddenly finds itself once again imprisoned below Kerbin's surface in its cage. It determinedly begins to burrow towards you once again.
